      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String username,
           java.net.InetAddress server,
           java.lang.String domain,
           java.lang.String password,
           java.lang.String command,
           java.lang.String directory)
             throws ConnectionException
        Connect to a server
        Parameters:
        username - Username for log on
        server - Server to connect to
        flags - Flags defining logon type
        domain - Domain for log on
        password - Password for log on
        command - Alternative shell for session
        directory - Initial working directory for connection
        Throws:
        ConnectionException

      • mainLoop

        public void mainLoop(boolean[] deactivated,
            int[] ext_disc_reason)
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     RdesktopException,
                     OrderException,
                     CryptoException
        RDP receive loop
        Parameters:
        deactivated - On return, stores true in deactivated[0] if the session disconnected cleanly
        ext_disc_reason - On return, stores the reason for disconnection in ext_disc_reason[0]
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        RdesktopException
        OrderException
        CryptoException
